attributes.action: Save the Heathrow Concorde G-BOAB from crumbling away.
attributes.additional_details: This aircraft is out on the elements 24/7. Look at what Manchester have done with their static Concorde. She is visited by tens of thousands of people a year. She is looked after by a team of wonderful enthusiastic counters.  She has a jarrah license. She is yet to be be equalled nevermind surpassed in Civil Aviation thus is still relevant to the world. Heathrow amd Local authorities should work together to giver her and the people of London and it's visitors an attraction to learn about.
attributes.background: This beautiful aircraft is currently being allowed to rot away in the elements.  As a testament to human ingenuity and British Engineering she should be respected. We want her housed and restored and used as a visitor attraction. She is still loved and revered across the globe. Let's not let her die

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise isn't the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. The maintenance of this aircraft is the responsibility of British Airways and the owners of Heathrow airport.
